attributes.background:
Free soldier x from prison
Clear the man of all charges due to the conditions of his service in Iraq 
Seeing what these soldiers see is enough to destroy the human spirit

rejection.details:
It´s not clear what specific case you are referring to. 

If you want all British soldiers to have legal immunity from prosecution, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165069
